resources.string: New version of MariaDB(%1$s) is available, do you want to install it?
Cannot start server - data directory does not exist

This is totally free MariaDB(version %1$s) server for Android.

Author

Tautvydas Andrikys, esminis@esminis.lt

This is short manual of some important parts of application:

Default user is root with empty password.
! By default root user can connect from any host so be careful.

Server data directory by default is sdcard/mariadb so there you will find data files.
